content: Not for the first time, I've runleanproject build without first committing my work to git and everything I've typed so far this morning has vanished. leanproject build should at least prompt the user before doing this!
@Eric Wieser do you think this is fixed by mathlib-tools#113?
But someone should check, because I never use leanproject build as lean --make is safer (due to this bug)
In that case, perhaps https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html point 6 should say lean --make instead of leanproject build?
@Christopher Hoskin Hopefully there will be a new release of leanproject this weekend that fixes this bug.
Our apologies for this very dangerous trap.
